text: So tathāsato viharanto taṃ dhammaṃ paññāya pavicinati pavicayati parivīmaṃsaṃ āpajjati
edit: So tathāsato viharanto taṃ dhammaṃ paññāya pavicinati pavicayati parivīmaṃsaṃ āpajjati

translations.transtext: That [monk], [when] living mindfully, examines, investigates, undertakes a thorough examination that dhamma by wisdom.
